duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide case management and health system navigation to improve coordination and outcomes for individuals served by BMC's Community Behavioral Health Center.
Collaborate with individuals receiving services to work on treatment goals and provide updates on progress.
Liaise with community provider agencies and other stakeholders to advocate for client needs and make referrals for necessary services and supports.
Assist in scheduling appointments, planning for transportation, and completing applications for community services.
Maintain positive relationships with collaborating and consulting healthcare providers and community agencies.
Assist in making referrals and supporting individuals with follow through as part of the multidisciplinary team.
Coordinate clinical patient services and interpreter services as required.
Contribute to the development of new ideas that impact the program and maintain patient confidentiality.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma required. Bachelor's Degree preferred.
